content:
mr PERIOD and Mrs PERIOD THON are thrown in the air after winning the Mr PERIOD and Mrs PERIOD THON pageant in Eisenhower Auditorium Wednesday night PERIOD Lindsay Bloom Ms PERIOD Entertainment and Tyler Bank Mr PERIOD R  R competed against the other THON committee representatives in judged talent and statement contests PERIOD

More than  THON enthusiasts joined together last night to cheer on fellow committee members and await the crowning of Mr PERIOD and Mrs PERIOD THON  PERIOD

Eisenhower Auditorium was anything but quiet as the Mr PERIOD and Mrs PERIOD THON  Pageant took place in order to raise money for the Penn State IFCPanhellenic Dance Marathon PERIOD

As  contestants took the stage one male and one female participant represented each of the  different THON committees PERIOD

With the help of Family Relations Captain Aly Young Four Diamonds children Bryan and Braydan Weinsheimer hosted the pageant as they introduced every new act and entertained the audience themselves as they performed a hulahoop routine PERIOD

Committee captain pairs performed a variety of talents for the first portion of the pageant from a balloon battle by the merchandise committee an original THON song written by the public relations committee and a humorous baking show rendition by the morale committee PERIOD

Shortly after showing off their talents each contestant dressed up fellow THON volunteers in a variety of different things such as hard hats feathered boas and foam fingers to explain to the judges how the disorganized ensemble represented his or her specific committee PERIOD

Giving the judges   Homecoming Queen Rhonda Bates Homecoming Executive Director Bobby Walter Mens Hockey Captain Tommy Olczyk and B94. radio station Program Director P.J PERIOD Mullen  an opportunity to tally up their votes Jack and Tiffany Weinsheimer of Lancaster Pa.shared their son Bryans story of battling pediatric cancer PERIOD

Before becoming a Four Diamonds family Tiffany Weinsheimer said she never knew what FTK stood for PERIOD

Now these kids look up to you guys Weinsheimer said PERIOD The Penn State students stand by us. after the judges tallied up their scores three Mr PERIOD and Mrs PERIOD THON finalists were decided PERIOD

The competition quickly became narrowed down to Tyler Bank as Mr PERIOD Rules and Regulations Chris Carmody as Mr PERIOD Public Relations and Steven Fundaro as Mr PERIOD Entertainment PERIOD

The top three Mrs PERIOD THON finalists were Gabby Tollok as Mrs PERIOD Rules and Regulations Lindsay Bloom as Mrs PERIOD Entertainment and Cara Wojciechowsi as Mrs PERIOD Family Relations PERIOD

The final six competitors were then asked a series of questions ranging from what their favorite dance moves were to what it means to be a THON volunteer and what it would mean to be Mr PERIOD or Mrs PERIOD THON PERIOD

After questions were answered and the THON executive committee performed their own talent to What Would the Fox Say the winners were eventually announced PERIOD

Mr PERIOD Rules and Regulations Tyler Bank and Mrs PERIOD Entertainment Lindsay Bloom took the crown as Mr PERIOD and Mrs PERIOD THON  PERIOD

We have to think about the kids first Bank told judges prior to winning the pageant PERIOD We always do as much as we can because kids and families go through one of the most difficult situations ever. the most important aspect of being Mrs PERIOD THON is the opportunity to represent the largest philanthropy in the world Bloom said when asked what becoming Mrs PERIOD THON would mean to her PERIOD

It is an honor she said PERIOD Hopefully one day we can spread awareness throughout the world. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Gabriella Santoliquito can be reached at gqs5171psu.edu or   PERIOD Follow her on Twitter at gmsanto3 PERIOD

Were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
